item.title: 7 Cats
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
In the space between the magical world and the human world, there is a cafe called 7 CATS, which is a meeting place for the residents of the magical world. After a series of events which lead to him helping out at the cafe, ordinary high-school student Kei is inspired to become an apprentice magician...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: In the space between the magical world and the human world, there is a cafe called 7 CATS, which is a meeting place for the residents of the magical world. After a series of events which lead to him helping out at the cafe, ordinary high-school student Kei is inspired to become an apprentice magician himself.
